name: Logical Switch
description: Processes boolean values and routes them accordingly

seperatedOutputs.label: Seperated Outputs
seperatedOutputs.description: Uses separate outputs for true and false

help.description: Processes boolean values, maps them to configured true/false values, and routes messages to separate outputs or a single output.

payload.name: payload
payload.description: Boolean value or value that can be interpreted as boolean

result.name: result
result.description: Message with mapped true/false value (single output mode) or routed to true/false outputs (separated mode)

details.text: Configure custom values for true and false states. Input values are converted to boolean and then mapped to these configured values.
Enable 'Separated Outputs' to route true values to output 1 and false values to output 2. Disable to send all values to a single output.
Configure 'Set property' to specify which message property should contain the result (default: msg.payload).
Use 'Debounce flank' to filter out rapid state changes: 'Both' debounces all changes, 'Rising' only debounces false→true transitions, 'Falling' only debounces true→false transitions.
Useful for converting sensor states, processing boolean logic, or creating ON/OFF control signals.
